ch0198_00_azami/0101_0701_01_10:
Oh, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
Spirited as ever, I see.
ch0198_00_azami/0101_0701_02_10:
I’ll be watching how you handle your battles...
Give it all you’ve got.
ch0198_00_azami/0601_0701_01_10:
My serpentine Pokémon and I have won
many battles together.
ch0198_00_azami/0601_0701_02_10:
They like to coil around their opponents and
squeeze tightly, constricting them. They certainly
have their quirks when it comes to moves...
ch0198_00_azami/0601_0701_03_10: but I adore them for it.
ch0198_00_azami/0601_0701_04_10:
And I intend to stick with them. I have a reputation
to uphold as Pike Queen, after all.
ch0198_00_azami/0601_0702_01_10:
Someday, you may end up earning a title
like mine.
ch0198_00_azami/0601_0702_02_10:
Especially if you have something you adore as
completely as I do.
ch0198_00_azami/0602_0701_02_10:
Staring at me isn’t going to suddenly make me
feel like talking, you know.
ch0198_00_azami/0602_0702_01_10:
Some people can understand each another without
needing to say a word...
ch0198_00_azami/0602_0702_02_10: Seems nice, doesn’t it? That sort of bond...
ch0198_00_azami/0603_0701_01_10:
You are never so skilled that victory is
completely certain.
ch0198_00_azami/0603_0701_02_10:
More often than not, luck is what tilts the scales
of battle.
ch0198_00_azami/0603_0701_03_10:
Don’t get me wrong—I’m not saying that’s a good
excuse for losing.
ch0198_00_azami/0603_0701_04_10:
After all, I believe true strength is the ability to
overcome whatever obstacles bad luck has placed
in your path.
ch0198_00_azami/0603_0702_01_10:
Luck might also have a hand in deciding who we
meet in life...
ch0198_00_azami/0603_0702_02_10:
As to whether our meeting was a stroke of good
luck or bad...
ch0198_00_azami/0604_0701_01_10:
When someone defeats me, I burn their face into
my memory.
ch0198_00_azami/0604_0701_02_10:
Then my Pokémon and I train even harder,
dreaming of the day when we’ll eventually
defeat them.
ch0198_00_azami/0604_0701_03_10:
So, in that sense, the sting of defeat is what
drives us to grow stronger.
ch0198_00_azami/0604_0702_01_10: Have you had battles that you just can’t forget?
ch0198_00_azami/0604_0702_02_10: If so, don’t try to gloss over those memories.
ch0198_00_azami/0604_0702_03_10:
Face them head on, and you’ll emerge stronger
than before.
ch0198_00_azami/0605_0701_01_10:
It seems both skill and luck are on your side
in battle, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0198_00_azami/0605_0701_02_10:
You might just have a decent shot at surviving
the Battle Pike...
ch0198_00_azami/0605_0701_03_10:
If you ever feel so inclined, I’ll be there to take
you on.
ch0198_00_azami/0605_0701_04_10:
But don’t expect me to meet you with anything less
than my full power!
ch0198_00_azami/0605_0702_01_10:
Skill can be sharpened through training, but luck is
another story.
ch0198_00_azami/0605_0702_02_10:
Perhaps having good luck is a natural talent in its
own right.
ch0198_00_azami/1701_0701_02_10:
I happened to find this, but I don’t need it. So it’s
all yours.
ch0198_00_azami/1701_0702_01_10:
Maybe later, you’ll receive another gift from
someone else...
ch0198_00_azami/1701_0702_02_10: if your luck doesn’t run out, that is.
ch0198_00_azami/2501_0701_01_10:
The desire to grow stronger than your opponent
is a powerful motivating force.
ch0198_00_azami/2501_0701_02_10:
But your drive seems to stem from other sources,
such as your love for your Pokémon...
ch0198_00_azami/2501_0701_03_10: not to mention the joy you feel during battle.
ch0198_00_azami/2501_0701_04_10:
It’s not exactly my style, but perhaps your way
of getting stronger has its advantages.
ch0198_00_azami/2501_0702_01_10: I admit, you really pique my curiosity.
ch0198_00_azami/2501_0702_02_10:
I have a feeling I’ll remember you for the rest
of my life.
ch0198_00_azami/2511_0701_01_10:
Normally, I’m content to keep conversations with
other Trainers focused the topic of battle.
ch0198_00_azami/2511_0701_02_10:
But lately, I find myself talking to you about all
kinds of things. Even trivial matters.
ch0198_00_azami/2511_0701_03_10:
I’ve never been one for idle chatter. I considered it
a distraction, at best.
ch0198_00_azami/2511_0701_04_10: But this rapport we have...well, I don’t mind it.
ch0198_00_azami/2511_0702_01_10:
I’ve learned that there’s a lot to be gained from
interacting with other Trainers.
ch0198_00_azami/2511_0702_02_10:
That lesson alone was worth my coming to Pasio,
to be honest.
ch0198_00_azami/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning. *sigh*
Oh? Did you need something?
ch0198_00_azami/3002_0701_01_10:
Stop... Just stop...
It’s too early for you to have that much energy.
ch0198_00_azami/3003_0701_01_10:
I guess I could listen to what you have to say...
as long as you don’t expect me to respond.
ch0198_00_azami/3004_0701_01_10:
Taking care of oneself is a skill everyone should
learn... I refuse to be seen at anything but
my strongest.
ch0198_00_azami/3005_0701_01_10:
Your battles weren’t bad today...
I hope your luck stays with you into tomorrow.
ch0198_00_azami/3006_0701_01_10:
It’s dangerous out there at night—keep your wits
about you.
